newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-Australian Stocks to Watch Today - Nov 5.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-Australian Stocks to Watch Today - Nov 5.

text.p: Some Australian stocks to watch this morning:
* Broken Hill Pty Co Ltd A$16.98 (+0.13)

Nucor Corp raised steel prices by $10 per ton when it opened its first-quarter order book over the weekend, President John Correnti told Reuters Monday. Correnti said the price increase affects hot-rolled, cold-rolled and galvanized steel products. Correnti said Nucor raised prices because demand continues to be strong.

Cumnock Coal Ltd said on Tuesday that former alternate director Stanley Howard has been elected a director and chairman of the company. His appointment follows the resignation last Wednesday of chairman and managing director Tom Johnson.
Institutional investor National Mutual Holdings Ltd has arranged to meet St George Bank Ltd to discuss its merger with Advance Bank Australia Ltd in a sign of growing disquiet over the deal.
Appliance and building materials manufacturer Email Ltd on Monday reported 10.4 percent lower half year net profit of A$23.85 million to September 30 and cut its interim dividend.
